title: Handle Return for Wrong Item Ordered
description: A retailer admits they ordered the wrong item and wants to return it.

tasks.description: The retailer requests an RMA for the item they ordered by mistake.
Inform the retailer that they will be responsible for the return shipping costs and may be subject to a restocking fee, per company policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the return policy.

tasks.description: When the item is returned and inspected, issue a credit to the retailer, minus the restocking fee.
